member.name: T:MindFusion.Diagramming.Export.SwfExporter
member.summary: Creates Adobe Flash files representing the content of a diagram.

member.name: M:MindFusion.Diagramming.Export.SwfExporter.Export(MindFusion.Diagramming.Diagram,System.String)
member.summary: Creates an SWF file representing the specified diagram.
member.param: A reference to the diagram that will be exported.
The full path to the SWF file.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Diagramming.Export.SwfExporter.CreateHtmlPage
member.summary: Specifies whether to create an html page to host the SWF file.

member.name: P:MindFusion.Diagramming.Export.SwfExporter.TextTransformsAsImages
member.summary: Specify whether to use bitmap images to render text with unsupported text transforms.
